DOC.brief_summary: The aim study investigate effect og physical exercise bloodglucose pain musculoskeletal system patient type 2 diabetes . The patient recruit 12 week exercise twice weekly . The outomes long term bloodglucose ( HbA1c ) pain report questionaires . In data analysis patient stratify patient high low degree complication relate diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Physical Exercise Blood Glucose Pain From Muskuloskeletal System Patients With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: Design : Uncontrolled intervention study Patients : Type 2 diabetes Nordsj√¶llands Hospital , Denmark Inclusion critera : adult , type 2 diabetes , participate ungoing exercise program , able conduct exercise training Exclusion criterion : unable understand Danish , psychiatric disorder , dementia Intervention : two time one hour exercise training 12 week . The training combine aerobic resistance training supervised physiotherapists Outcome : bloodglucose , pain ( questionaire ) Sample size : 80 participant
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis Type 2 diabetes Must able perform physical exercise Participation structure exercise program within past three month Dementia Unable understand Danish language
